remarks: Image of a limit under a continuous map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2015.)
statement:
climcncf.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climcncf.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climcncf.4 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( A -cn-> B ) ) $.
climcncf.5 $e |- ( ph -> G : Z --> A ) $.
climcncf.6 $e |- ( ph -> G ~~> D ) $.
climcncf.7 $e |- ( ph -> D e. A ) $.
climcncf $p |- ( ph -> ( F o. G ) ~~> ( F ` D ) ) $.
